name: Tech.Li
tag_list: media, news, entrepreneurship, start-ups, chicago, technology
overview:
Tech.li - highlighting innovation all over the country.

Tech.li is a technology weblog dedicated to covering a wide range of the latest technology companies, start-ups, and products.

Tech.li works with the expansive community of technology, social media, interactive and other technology start-ups to help shape future of technology news media and provide exposure to all start-up companies.

Follow us on twitter @techDOTli
